root.name: Elemental Monster Online Card Game
root.description: Players create Decks of a max of six cards. The overall strategy depends on the placement of cards and the element types matched against the opponents elemental type of monsters. So water is weak against fire and so on. A player can create up to three different decks and store them for easy switch out between matches.Players can compete in a rather long single player mode and gain cards after completing matches. Players can also purchase card booster packs using real money to add to their collection and decks.Online multiplayer is conducted by a ticket system where each player uses a multiplayer ticket to compete. Each player gets ten tickets where more can be obtained through a pay to play system or by competing in tournaments. Playing with friends is free.
